title: Threshold Properties of Monomial Ideals
description: Investigated threshold properties of monomial ideals.  Obtained nontrivial bounds for pojective dimension. Used Maculay2 (an algebraic research language) to search for and test conjectures.

title: Linearly Presented Ideals
description: Investigated properties of primary monomial ideals with linear presentation. Extensively used Macaulay2 to visualize ideals and brute force calculations in lower dimension.
